name: 招蕩的妄想劇場
summary:
这是发生在被称为「亚瑟王」的少女死前的一段小插曲。
This event occurs before the girl by the name of King Arthur passes away.

尚未与「世界」订下契约、第四次圣杯战争之前…
－－梦的延续。
before she makes a contract with the world and before the 4th holy grail war…
－－the continuation of a dream.

少女在弥留之际，脑海中浮现人生的跑马灯－－
亚瑟王与圆桌骑士团，那往日荣耀光辉的岁月。
As the girl lay in a coma, she had a flashback of her life－－
The days of King Arthur and the knights of the round, those glorious days of her past.

「妳的愿望，是什么呢？」
“What is your wish?”

不知从何传来的声音，将她卷入了轮回的历史之中。
在反覆探索的历史里，可否有她所寻找的答案？
An unknown voice drew her back to relive history.
Upon revisiting her past, can she find the answer that she seeks?

「这一次，我一定可以改变命运。」
This time, I can change my fate.
